EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Microsoft Cloud Native Workshop_Des Moines_Q217.Des Moines Reminde
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud-Native Workshop Des Moines | Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We look forward to seeing you tomorrow for the Cloud-Native Workshop, hosted by Pivotal, Microsoft and Dynatrace in Des Moines. As a reminder, this will be a full, fun day to learn about patterns and technology. We’ll take care of lunch, so don’t worry about packing anything!
Date: Wednesday, October 4, 2017
Time:
11AM to 4PM
Location: Microsoft Des Moines 1408 Locust Street, Suite 102 Des Moines, IA 50309 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Microsoft/@41.5846255,-93.6348428,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0xc578ec4b3f216240!8m2!3d41.5846255!4d-93.6348428]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please contact the organizer at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal, Microsoft & Dynatrace Teams See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/microsoft-cloud-native-roadshow-desmoines.html]]>
